title: Bug 118780: Incorrect column names displayed in expression builder when selecting dataset
description: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the alias names.
OB: The original name of the first column is listed in the expression builder instead of the alias name.
EB: According to SCR 78193, the alias name should be displayed for the first column in the expression builder.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset.
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder, select the dataset, and double click the first column name.
